alert.note: Alert for Kofa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 12:02AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Paz and northwestern Yuma Counties through 1230 AM MST... At 1201 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Yuma Proving Ground, or 23 miles north of Martinez Lake, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yuma Proving Ground. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 68 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
